blocking_issues.description: security controls required by ADR-003, including LRU eviction for memory management and token-aware history compression to prevent budget bypass attacks. While the top-ranked analysis (Response C) correctly identified a potential DoS vector via unbounded metadata sizes, the consensus is that the code addresses the primary security concerns (infinite growth loops) and is ready for production, provided that payload size validation is handled upstream or in a follow-up hardening phase."
